summary: REQ-1 appears implemented by refactoring TanStack Router setup to use a RootLayout root route (avoiding referencing an uninitialized router). REQ-3 appears implemented by adding a buildInfo config and displaying the identifier in the footer. REQ-2 cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary because frontend/src/main.tsx is not shown, so we cannot confirm there is exactly one QueryClientProvider at runtime. Several unrelated UI/feature changes appear in the diff summary that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the app uses a single React Query QueryClientProvider (avoid nesting different QueryClientProviders between frontend/src/main.tsx and frontend/src/App.tsx).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows App.tsx changes and claims QueryClientProvider was removed from App.tsx, but frontend/src/main.tsx is not included in the diff summary content, so it is not possible to confirm that exactly one QueryClientProvider remains in the runtime tree.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (shows router setup; no visible QueryClientProvider in truncated snippet)
File diff summary does not include frontend/src/main.tsx

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed Tailwind animations and keyframes (float-gentle, fade-in-up, scale-in) for UI motion effects.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement (REQ-1/2/3 focus on router init, React Query provider duplication, and build identifier display).

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple service pages updated with new illustrations/animations and content tweaks (MobileOpticianPage, RentalsPage, RepairsPage).
Provider dashboard and bookings pages behavior changes (INR formatting, conditional fields, status management, schedule rendering).
Added branding/logo utilities and a protected branding settings page with upload/preview/toasts.
Site header navigation changes (Provider Portal replaced with Contact Us dropdown, My Profile completion percentage).
